fullDescription.intro: This layer crops the layer input in a single dimension. Corresponds to the Keras Cropping 1D Layer.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.
A tuple of two integers. How many units should be trimmed off at the beginning and end of the cropping dimension.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a Cropping 1D layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Cropping 1D layer.
